name: Until the deads tear us apart
name_original: Until the deads tear us apart
description:
A couple trying to survive a zombie apocalypse ends up stranding themselves on top of a building

Command:
WASD move your character
Mouse Left Click shoots, 

Mouse Right Click sends your partner to the place you click
"E" makes your partner build a Turret. After a short time, you have a turret gun disposed!

                          If your partner takes the boxes she earns scrap which is used to build turrets in addition to changing the turret she is currently using.

if you takes the box, you switche weapon and gain ammo

Disclaimer:

This game is made by a 12 year old. Any translations mishapennings will be fixed at future.
Beforehand:
"Jogar = Play"
"Jogar de novo = Play Again"
"Tela inicial = Back to Title"
